prompt: Extract the questions verbatim from {{file_names}} without using any other resources or paraphrasing; continue each question until the next top-level number (\d+[.)-]\s); ignore headers and footers like Generated on… or Page…; extract marks exactly as given—if marks are per question use those, if only total marks are provided divide them appropriately per question; if a question has sub-parts (e.g., 1(a), 1(b), 1(c)) keep it as a single question, using exact sub-part marks where provided or allocating marks by judgement if only a total is given; output only valid JSON in the format [{'Question number','Question text','Marks'}].
